plot: Years after the death of his father,the Overlord of the Netherworld, Laharl has awakened and must rise to the task of taking over the Netherworld in his stead. Comedic moments ensue.
title: Makai senki Deisugaia
plot_es: Years after the death of his father,the Overlord of the Netherworld, Laharl has awakened and must rise to the task of taking over the Netherworld in his stead. Comedic moments ensue.
plot_en: Years after the death of his father,the Overlord of the Netherworld, Laharl has awakened and must rise to the task of taking over the Netherworld in his stead. Comedic moments ensue.
